fields.name: CrossConnectRequestTitle
fields.fieldText: Service Request Information: Cross Connect Request

fields.name: I_Accept_Note
fields.fieldText:
By clicking accept, Customer acknowledges that certain fees may apply, as prescribed in the Customer Handbook, and payment shall be made

in accordance with the terms of the Agreement with Licensor.

fields.name: Billing_Account_Number_CrossConnect
fields.helpText: Your billing Account number is located at top right of your invoice (which starts with "M")

fields.name: Priority_CrossConnectSR
fields.helpText:
• Urgent - Target Response to Ticket - 30 Minutes/ Technician to Begin work - 1 Hour
  • High - Target Response to Ticket - 1 Hour/ Technician to Begin work - 2 Hours
  • Normal - Target Response to Ticket - 2 Hours/ Technician to Begin work - 24 Hours
